attributes.action: NOW ask the Queen to dissolve Parliament so that the electorate can restore its faith in politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Country can wait no longer for a change of government.
We need a government that WON'T keep trying to restore the economy by digging an even deeper hole in our finances, WON'T abuse our confidence by lying to us about its mistakes and WILL restore the privacy and human rights that, as a democracy, we are all entitled to but that this government's obsession with spying on us all is intent on destroying.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
